title: EU agrees on internet rulebook for Google, Facebook, other tech giants - Economic Times
content:
1. EU agrees on internet rulebook for Google, Facebook, other tech giants  Economic Times
  2. Tech Companies Face Billions in Fines Under EU Content Rules  Bloomberg
  3. Europe agrees to sweeping new regulations for tech platforms  CNN
  4. European Union Finalises New Legislation To Curb Big Tech Dominance  NDTV
  5. EU approves groundbreaking rules to police Big Tech platforms  Financial Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The new rules ban targeted advertising aimed at children or based on sensitive data such as religion, gender, race and political opinions. Dark patterns, which are tactics that mislead people into giving personal data to companies online, will also be prohibited.
